title: Grocery market share in France 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share of total grocers for 10 number of Grocery Storess.
The maximum Market share of total grocers 21.6 is found at Grocery Stores E. Leclerc Group and the minimum is found at Other where Grocery Stores is 0.7.
There is a difference of 20.9 between the maximum Grocery Stores E. Leclerc Group and minimum Grocery Stores Other.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Grocery Stores, and Market share of total grocers in each Grocery Stores on the y axis.
The Market share of total grocers is appeared to be the highest at Grocery Stores E. Leclerc Group and lowest at Grocery Stores Other.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share of total grocers for 10 number of Grocery Storess.
The maximum Market share of total grocers 21.6 is found at Grocery Stores E. Leclerc Group and the minimum is found at Other where Grocery Stores is 0.7.
There is a difference of 20.9 between the maximum Grocery Stores E. Leclerc Group and minimum Grocery Stores Other.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Grocery Stores in the x axis and Market share of total grocers in the y axis.
Grocery Stores E. Leclerc Group has the highest Market share of total grocers and Other has the lowest Market share of total grocers.
Second maximum Market share of total grocers is found at Grocery Stores Carrefour Group.
The highest value at Grocery Stores E. Leclerc Group is 30.86x times more than the lowest value at Other.
The Grocery Stores E. Leclerc Group has the highest Market share of total grocers, followed by Carrefour Group, and Intermarché Group. Down to the Grocery Stores Other which is the lowest.
The highest value 21.6 at E. Leclerc Group is almost 2.16 times larger than the average value 10.0.
